description: He is a typical stuck-up star, and is also very ruthless. Shou had no qualms about tricking Kyouko into going with him to Tokyo so she could be a free servant for him. He also had even less qualms about being extremely cruel to her when she discovered this. Shou eventually figured out that Kyouko was in L.M.E., and was surprised to see her transformation.
name: Fuwa Shou
